trans-unit.source: Determines whether the window accepts the focus during keyboard traversal (e.g., Tab and Shift-Tab). Before setting the focus to a window, the traversal scripts consult the value of the -takefocus option. A value of 0 means that the window should be skipped entirely during keyboard traversal. 1 means that the window should receive the input focus as long as it is viewable (it and all of its ancestors are mapped). An empty value for the option means that the traversal scripts make the decision about whether or not to focus on the window: the current algorithm is to skip the window if it is disabled, if it has no key bindings, or if it is not viewable. If the value has any other form, then the traversal scripts take the value, append the name of the window to it (with a separator space), and evaluate the resulting string as a Tcl script. The script must return 0, 1, or an empty string: a 0 or 1 value specifies whether the window will receive the input focus, and an empty string results in the default decision described above. Note: this interpretation of the option is defined entirely by the Tcl scripts that implement traversal: the widget implementations ignore the option entirely, so you can change its meaning if you redefine the keyboard traversal scripts.
trans-unit.target: 确定在键盘遍历期间窗口是否接受焦点（例如，Tab和Shift-Tab）。在将焦点设置到窗口之前，遍历脚本会参考-takefocus选项的值。值为0表示在遍历键盘时应完全跳过窗口。1个意味着只要窗口可见（该窗口及其所有祖先都已映射），该窗口就应该获得输入焦点。该选项的值为空意味着遍历脚本将决定是否将焦点放在窗口上：当前算法是在禁用，无键绑定或不可见的情况下跳过窗口。如果该值具有任何其他形式，则遍历脚本将使用该值，将窗口名称附加到该值（带有分隔符），然后将结果字符串评估为Tcl脚本。该脚本必须返回0，1，或一个空字符串：一个0或1值指定窗口是否将接收输入焦点，并且空字符串将导致上述默认决定。注意：对选项的这种解释完全由实现遍历的Tcl脚本定义：小部件实现完全忽略该选项，因此，如果您重新定义键盘遍历脚本，则可以更改其含义。

trans-unit.source: Dictionaries are values that contain an efficient, order-preserving mapping from arbitrary keys to arbitrary values. Each key in the dictionary maps to a single value. They have a textual format that is exactly that of any list with an even number of elements, with each mapping in the dictionary being represented as two items in the list. When a command takes a dictionary and produces a new dictionary based on it (either returning it or writing it back into the variable that the starting dictionary was read from) the new dictionary will have the same order of keys, modulo any deleted keys and with new keys added on to the end. When a string is interpreted as a dictionary and it would otherwise have duplicate keys, only the last value for a particular key is used; the others are ignored, meaning that, “apple banana” and “apple carrot apple banana” are equivalent dictionaries (with different string representations).
trans-unit.target: 字典是包含从任意键到任意值的高效，顺序保留映射的值。字典中的每个键都映射到一个值。它们的文本格式恰好是具有偶数个元素的任何列表的文本格式，字典中的每个映射都表示为列表中的两项。当命令获取字典并基于该字典生成新字典（将其返回或将其写回到读取起始字典的变量中）时，新字典将具有相同的键顺序，所有已删除键的模和新密钥添加到末尾。当字符串被解释为字典，并且否则会具有重复的键时，则仅使用特定键的最后一个值；其他被忽略，这意味着，“苹果香蕉”和“苹果胡萝卜苹果香蕉”是等效的字典（具有不同的字符串表示形式）。

trans-unit.source: Due to the different pattern matching rules on the various platforms, to ensure portability, wild card characters are not allowed in the extensions, except as in the special extension “*”. Extensions without a full stop character (e.g. “~”) are allowed but may not work on all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 由于各种平台上的模式匹配规则不同，为了确保可移植性，扩展名中不允许使用通配符，除非特殊扩展名“ *”除外。允许不带句点字符（例如“〜”）的扩展名，但可能不适用于所有平台。

trans-unit.source: Due to the internal Tcl core implementation and the restriction on transferring shared channels, one has to take extra measures when transferring socket channels created by accepting the connection out of the socket commands callback procedures:
trans-unit.target: 由于内部Tcl核心实现和传输共享通道的限制，因此在从套接字命令回调过程中接受通过连接创建的套接字通道进行传输时，必须采取额外的措施：

trans-unit.source: Due to the internal design of the Tcl core, there is no provision of full integration of shared variables within the Tcl syntax, unfortunately . All access to shared data must be performed with the supplied package commands . Also, variable traces are not supported . But even so, benefits of easy, simple and safe shared data manipulation outweights imposed limitations .
trans-unit.target: 由于Tcl核心的内部设计,很遗憾,在Tcl语法中没有提供完全集成共享变量的功能。所有对共享数据的访问都必须通过提供的包命令来完成。同时,也不支持变量跟踪。但即使如此,轻松、简单和安全的共享数据操作的好处还是超过了所施加的限制。

trans-unit.source: During local grabs, keyboard events (key presses and key releases) are delivered as usual: the window manager controls which application receives keyboard events, and if they are sent to any window in the grabbing application then they are redirected to the focus window. During a global grab Tk grabs the keyboard so that all keyboard events are always sent to the grabbing application. The focus command is still used to determine which window in the application receives the keyboard events. The keyboard grab is released when the grab is released.
trans-unit.target: 在本地抓取期间，照常传递键盘事件（按键和释放键）：窗口管理器控制哪个应用程序接收键盘事件，如果将它们发送到抓取应用程序中的任何窗口，则将它们重定向到焦点窗口。在全局抓取过程中，Tk抓取键盘，以便所有键盘事件始终发送到抓取应用程序。所述聚焦命令仍用于确定哪个窗口在应用程序接收键盘事件。释放手柄时，键盘手柄也将释放。

trans-unit.source: Each test should include whatever -constraints are required to constrain it to run only where appropriate. Several constraints are pre-defined in the tcltest package, listed below. The registration of user-defined constraints is performed by the testConstraint command. User-defined constraints may appear within a test file, or within the script specified by the configure -load or configure -loadfile options.
trans-unit.target: 每个测试应包括任何-constraints需要限制它只能在适当情况下运行。在下面列出的tcltest软件包中预定义了几个约束。用户定义的约束的注册由testConstraint命令执行。用户定义的约束可能出现在测试文件中，或在configure -load或configure -loadfile选项指定的脚本中。

trans-unit.source: Each call to this command decrements the reference counter of the threadpool
trans-unit.target: 每次调用该命令,都会减少线程池的参考计数

trans-unit.source: Each call to this command increments the reference counter of the threadpool
trans-unit.target: 每次调用该命令都会递增线程池的参考计数器。

trans-unit.source: Each character is processed exactly once by the Tcl interpreter as part of creating the words of a command. For example, if variable substitution occurs then no further substitutions are performed on the value of the variable; the value is inserted into the word verbatim. If command substitution occurs then the nested command is processed entirely by the recursive call to the Tcl interpreter; no substitutions are performed before making the recursive call and no additional substitutions are performed on the result of the nested script.
trans-unit.target: 每一个字符都会被Tcl解释器准确地处理一次,作为创建命令字的一部分。例如,如果发生了变量替换,那么就不会对变量的值进行进一步的替换,而是逐字逐句地插入到词中。如果发生命令替换,那么嵌套的命令完全由Tcl解释器的递归调用来处理;在进行递归调用之前不进行任何替换,也不对嵌套脚本的结果进行额外的替换。

trans-unit.source: Each class has its own namespace containing things that are common to all objects which belong to the class. For example, "common" data members are shared by all objects in the class. They are global variables that exist in the class namespace, but since they are included in the class definition, they need not be declared using the global command; they are automatically available to any code executing in the class context. A class can also create ordinary global variables, but these must be declared using the global command each time they are used.
trans-unit.target: 每个类都有其自己的名称空间，其中包含属于该类的所有对象共有的内容。例如，该类中的所有对象都共享“公共”数据成员。它们是存在于类名称空间中的全局变量，但是由于它们包含在类定义中，因此无需使用global命令进行声明；它们可自动用于在类上下文中执行的任何代码。一个类也可以创建普通的全局变量，但是每次使用它们时都必须使用全局命令声明它们。

trans-unit.source: Each conversion specifier may contain up to six different parts: an XPG3 position specifier, a set of flags, a minimum field width, a precision, a size modifier, and a conversion character. Any of these fields may be omitted except for the conversion character. The fields that are present must appear in the order given above. The paragraphs below discuss each of these fields in turn.
trans-unit.target: 每个转换说明符最多可以包含六个不同的部分:一个XPG3位置说明符、一组标志、一个最小字段宽度、一个精度、一个大小修饰符和一个转换字符。除转换字符外,这些字段中的任何一个都可以省略。存在的字段必须按照上面给出的顺序出现。下面的段落将逐一讨论这些字段。

trans-unit.source: Each element of the initial access path list will be assigned a token that will be set in the slave auto_path and the first element of that list will be set as the tcl_library for that slave.
trans-unit.target: 将为初始访问路径列表的每个元素分配一个令牌，该令牌将在从属服务器auto_path中设置，并且该列表的第一个元素将设置为该从属服务器的tcl_library。

trans-unit.source: Each element of the list becomes a single element of the delegated command --it is never reparsed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的每一个元素都会成为委托命令的一个元素--它永远不会被当作一个字符串来表示。

trans-unit.source: Each filter should decide for itself whether to permit the execution to go forward to the proper implementation of the method (which it does by invoking the next command as filters are inserted into the front of the method call chain) and is responsible for returning the result of next.
trans-unit.target: 每个过滤器应自行决定是否允许执行继续执行方法的正确实现（当将过滤器插入方法调用链的前面时，通过调用下一个命令来执行此操作），并负责返回结果下一个。

trans-unit.source: Each interpreter is independent from the others: it has its own name space for commands, procedures, and global variables. A master interpreter may create connections between its slaves and itself using a mechanism called an
trans-unit.target: 每个解释器都是独立于其他解释器的:它有自己的命令、过程和全局变量的名称空间。一个主解释器可以使用一种称为 "解释器 "的机制在它的从属解释器和它自己之间建立连接。

trans-unit.source: Each item also has a list of
trans-unit.target: 每个项目也有一个列表

trans-unit.source: Each item is identified by a unique name. The widget will generate item IDs if they are not supplied by the caller. There is a distinguished root item, named {}. The root item itself is not displayed; its children appear at the top level of the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 每个项目均由唯一名称标识。如果调用者未提供项目ID，则小部件将生成项目ID。有一个独特的根项目，名为{}。根项目本身不显示；它的子级出现在层次结构的顶层。

trans-unit.source: Each item may also have any number of
trans-unit.target: 每个项目还可以有任何数量的

trans-unit.source: Each item should have the same number of values as the -columns widget option. If there are fewer values than columns, the remaining values are assumed empty. If there are more values than columns, the extra values are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 每个项目应与-columns小部件选项具有相同数量的值。如果值少于列，则剩余的值将被认为是空的。如果值多于列，则多余的值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Each mark also has a “gravity”, which is either left or right. The gravity for a mark specifies what happens to the mark when text is inserted at the point of the mark. If a mark has left gravity, then the mark is treated as if it were attached to the character on its left, so the mark will remain to the left of any text inserted at the mark position. If the mark has right gravity, new text inserted at the mark position will appear to the left of the mark (so that the mark remains rightmost). The gravity for a mark defaults to right.
trans-unit.target: 每个标记还具有“重力”，即“ 左”或“ 右”。标记的重力指定当在标记点插入文本时标记会发生什么情况。如果标记具有重力，则该标记将被视为附着在其左侧字符上，因此该标记将保留在标记位置插入的所有文本的左侧。如果该标记具有正确的重力，则在该标记位置插入的新文本将显示在该标记的左侧（以便该标记保持在最右侧）。标记的重力默认为right。

trans-unit.source: Each namespace
trans-unit.target: 每个命名空间

trans-unit.source: Each namespace can have its own collection of objects and classes. The list of classes available in the current context can be queried using the "itcl::find classes" command, and the list of objects, with the "itcl::find objects" command.
trans-unit.target: 每个名称空间可以具有其自己的对象和类的集合。可以使用“ itcl :: find classes ”命令查询当前上下文中可用的类列表，并使用“ itcl :: find objects ”命令查询对象列表。

trans-unit.source: Each namespace can have its own collection of objects and extendedclasses. The list of extendedclasses available in the current context can be queried using the "itcl::find extendedclasses" command, and the list of objects, with the "itcl::find objects" command.
trans-unit.target: 每个名称空间可以具有自己的对象和扩展类的集合。可以使用“ itcl :: find extendedclasses ”命令查询当前上下文中可用的扩展类列表，并使用“ itcl :: find objects ”命令查询对象列表。

trans-unit.source: Each namespace can have its own collection of objects and widgets. The list of widgets available in the current context can be queried using the "itcl::find widgets" command, and the list of objects, with the "itcl::find objects" command.
trans-unit.target: 每个名称空间都可以具有自己的对象和小部件集合。可以使用“ itcl :: find widgets ”命令查询当前上下文中可用的窗口小部件列表，并使用“ itcl :: find objects ”命令查询对象列表。

trans-unit.source: Each namespace has a textual name such as history or ::safe::interp. Since namespaces may nest, qualified names are used to refer to commands, variables, and child namespaces contained inside namespaces. Qualified names are similar to the hierarchical path names for Unix files or Tk widgets, except that :: is used as the separator instead of / or .. The topmost or global namespace has the name “” (i.e., an empty string), although :: is a synonym. As an example, the name ::safe::interp::create refers to the command create in the namespace interp that is a child of namespace ::safe, which in turn is a child of the global namespace, ::.
trans-unit.target: 每个名称空间都有一个文本名称，例如history或:: safe :: interp。由于名称空间可能会嵌套，因此使用限定名来引用名称空间中包含的命令，变量和子名称空间。限定名称与Unix文件或Tk小部件的分层路径名称相似，不同之处在于：::用作分隔符，而不是/或。。尽管::是同义词，但最顶层或全局名称空间的名称为“”（即，空字符串）。例如，名称:: safe :: interp :: create表示在名称空间interp中创建的命令，该命令是名称空间:: safe的子级，而后者又是全局名称空间::的子级。

trans-unit.source: Each newly created has its internal reference counter set to 0 (zero), i .e . it is unreserved . This counter gets incremented by a call to thread::preserve and decremented by a call to thread::release command . These two commands implement simple but effective thread reservation system and offer predictable and controllable thread termination capabilities . It is however possible to create initialy preserved threads by using flag -preserved of the thread::create command . Threads created with this flag have the initial value of the reference counter of 1 (one), and are thus initially marked reserved .
trans-unit.target: 每个新创建的都有其内部参考计数器设置为0（零），即。它是未保留的。通过调用thread :: preserve可以使该计数器递增，而通过调用thread :: release命令可以使该计数器递减。这两个命令实现了简单但有效的线程保留系统，并提供了可预测和可控制的线程终止功能。然而，可以通过标记来创建initialy保存线程-preserved的的线程::创建命令。使用此标志创建的线程的参考计数器的初始值为1（一），因此最初被标记为reserved。

trans-unit.source: Each object has a unique namespace associated with it, the instance namespace. This namespace holds all the instance variables of the object, and will be the current namespace whenever a method of the object is invoked (including a method of the class of the object). When the object is destroyed, its instance namespace is deleted. The instance namespace contains the object's my command, which may be used to invoke non-exported methods of the object or to create a reference to the object for the purpose of invocation which persists across renamings of the object.
trans-unit.target: 每个对象都有一个与之关联的唯一名称空间，即实例名称空间。此名称空间包含对象的所有实例变量，并且在调用对象的方法（包括对象类的方法）时将成为当前名称空间。当对象被销毁时，其实例名称空间将被删除。实例名称空间包含对象的my命令，该命令可用于调用对象的非导出方法或创建对对象的引用，以用于在对象重命名期间持久存在的调用目的。

trans-unit.source: Each object has its own my command, contained in its instance namespace.
trans-unit.target: 每个对象都有自己的my命令，包含在其实例名称空间中。

trans-unit.source: Each of the elements in a class can be declared "public", "protected" or "private". Public elements can be accessed by the class, by derived classes (other classes that inherit this class), and by external clients that use the class. Protected elements can be accessed by the class, and by derived classes. Private elements are only accessible in the class where they are defined.
trans-unit.target: 一个类中的每个元素都可以被声明为 "公共"、"保护 "或 "私有"。公共元素可以被该类、派生类(继承该类的其他类)和使用该类的外部客户访问。受保护的元素可以被类,以及派生类访问。私有元素只能在定义它们的类中被访问。

trans-unit.source: Each package using msgcat has a set of options within msgcat. The package options are described in the next sectionPackage options. Each package option may be set or unset individually using the following ensemble:
trans-unit.target: 每个使用msgcat的软件包在msgcat内都有一组选项。软件包选项在下一部分“软件包选项”中进行描述。每个软件包选项都可以使用以下组合单独设置或取消设置：

trans-unit.source: Each packet of memory allocated by ckalloc can have associated with it a string-valued tag. In the lists of allocated memory generated by memory active and memory onexit, the tag for each packet is printed along with other information about the packet. The memory tag command sets the tag value for subsequent calls to ckalloc to be
trans-unit.target: ckalloc分配的每个内存包都可以与它关联一个字符串值标签。在由内存活动和内存onexit生成的已分配内存列表中，每个数据包的标记与有关该数据包的其他信息一起打印。该内存标签命令的后续调用标签值设置为ckalloc是

trans-unit.source: Each pixel in the image displays a foreground color, a background color, or nothing. See the bitmap manual entry for more information.
trans-unit.target: 图像中的每个像素均显示前景色，背景色或什么都不显示。有关更多信息，请参见位图手册条目。

trans-unit.source: Each type-count pair moves an imaginary cursor through the binary data, reading bytes from the current position. The cursor is initially at position 0 at the beginning of the data. The type may be any one of the following characters:
trans-unit.target: 每个类型计数对都会在二进制数据中移动一个假想的光标,从当前位置读取字节。光标最初是在数据开始的0位置。类型可以是以下任何一个字符。

trans-unit.source: Each type-count pair moves an imaginary cursor through the binary data, storing bytes at the current position and advancing the cursor to just after the last byte stored. The cursor is initially at position 0 at the beginning of the data. The type may be any one of the following characters:
trans-unit.target: 每一个类型计数对都会在二进制数据中移动一个假想的光标,在当前位置存储字节,并将光标推进到存储的最后一个字节之后。光标最初是在数据开始的0位置。类型可以是以下任何一个字符。

trans-unit.source: Each value under a key in the registry contains some data of a particular type in a type-specific representation. The registry command converts between this internal representation and one that can be manipulated by Tcl scripts. In most cases, the data is simply returned as a Tcl string. The type indicates the intended use for the data, but does not actually change the representation. For some types, the registry command returns the data in a different form to make it easier to manipulate. The following types are recognized by the registry command:
trans-unit.target: 注册表中键下的每个值都包含特定类型的某些数据，这些数据以特定类型的表示形式表示。该注册表这个内部表示，另一种可以通过Tcl脚本进行操作之间命令转换。在大多数情况下，数据只是作为Tcl字符串返回。该类型指示数据的预期用途，但实际上不会更改表示形式。对于某些类型，registry命令以不同的形式返回数据，以使其更易于操作。Registry命令可以识别以下类型：

trans-unit.source: Each widget is assigned a
trans-unit.target: 每个小组件都有一个

trans-unit.source: Each widget is associated with a
trans-unit.target: 每个小组件都与一个

trans-unit.source: Each word in the pattern conventionally starts with either an upper-case letter (in which case it denotes the class of either a widget or an option) or any other character, when it denotes the name of a widget or option. The last word in the pattern always indicates the option; the preceding ones constrain which widgets that option will be looked for in.
trans-unit.target: 模式中的每个词通常以大写字母开头(在这种情况下,它表示小组件或选项的类别),或以任何其他字符开头,表示小组件或选项的名称。模式中的最后一个字总是表示选项;前面的字限制了该选项将在哪些小组件中被查找。

trans-unit.source: Either normal, disabled or hidden. If disabled, then the tab is not selectable. If hidden, then the tab is not shown.
trans-unit.target: 无论是正常的，禁用或隐藏。如果禁用，则该选项卡不可选择。如果为隐藏，则不显示该选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Either ok, for successful completion, reset for user-reset, timeout if a timeout occurred before the transaction could complete, or error for an error condition. During the transaction this value is the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 无论是好的，为顺利完成，重置用户复位，超时如果出现超时前的交易能够完成，或错误错误条件。在交易过程中，该值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Either windows, or unix. This identifies the general operating environment of the machine.
trans-unit.target: 无论是窗口，或UNIX。这标识了机器的一般操作环境。

trans-unit.source: Either forward or backward slashes are accepted as path separators for arguments to Tcl commands. When executing an application, the path name specified for the application may also contain forward or backward slashes as path separators. Bear in mind, however, that most Windows applications accept arguments with forward slashes only as option delimiters and backslashes only in paths. Any arguments to an application that specify a path name with forward slashes will not automatically be converted to use the backslash character. If an argument contains forward slashes as the path separator, it may or may not be recognized as a path name, depending on the program.
trans-unit.target: Tcl命令的参数可以用正向或反向斜线作为路径分隔符。当执行应用程序时,为应用程序指定的路径名也可以包含正向或反向斜线作为路径分隔符。但是,请记住,大多数Windows应用程序只接受带正向斜杠的参数作为选项分隔符,而只接受带反斜杠的参数作为路径分隔符。任何指向应用程序的参数,如果指定的路径名带有正斜线,则不会自动转换为使用反斜线字符。如果一个参数包含了正斜线作为路径分隔符,那么它可能会被识别为路径名,也可能不会,这取决于程序。

trans-unit.source: Either loop infinitely or not at all because the expression being evaluated is actually the constant, or even generate an error! The actual behaviour will depend on whether the variable

trans-unit.source: Element commands

trans-unit.source: Element names use a recursive dotted notation. For example, uparrow identifies a generic arrow element, and Scrollbar.uparrow and Combobox.uparrow identify widget-specific elements. When looking for an element, the style engine looks for the specific name first, and if an element of that name is not found it looks for generic elements by stripping off successive leading components of the element name.
trans-unit.target: 元素名称使用递归的点分表示法。例如，uparrow标识通用箭头元素，而Scrollbar.uparrow和Combobox.uparrow标识特定于小部件的元素。在查找元素时，样式引擎会首先查找特定名称，如果找不到该名称的元素，它将通过剥离元素名称的连续前导成分来查找通用元素。

trans-unit.source: Enables newline-sensitive matching. By default, newline is a completely ordinary character with no special meaning. With this flag, “[^” bracket expressions and “.” never match newline, “^” matches an empty string after any newline in addition to its normal function, and “$” matches an empty string before any newline in addition to its normal function. This flag is equivalent to specifying both -linestop and -lineanchor, or the (?n) embedded option (see the re_syntax manual page).
trans-unit.target: 启用对换行符敏感的匹配。默认情况下，换行符是完全普通的字符，没有特殊含义。使用此标志，“ [^”括起来的表达式和“。” 从不与换行符匹配，“ ^”除常规功能外与任何换行符后的空字符串匹配，“ $”除常规功能外与任何换行符前的空字符串匹配。此标志等效于同时指定-linestop和-lineanchor或嵌入式选项（？n）（请参见re_syntax手册页）。

trans-unit.source: Enables use of the expanded regular expression syntax where whitespace and comments are ignored. This is the same as specifying the (?x) embedded option (see the re_syntax manual page).

trans-unit.source: Escapes (AREs only), which begin with a \ followed by an alphanumeric character, come in several varieties: character entry, class shorthands, constraint escapes, and back references. A \ followed by an alphanumeric character but not constituting a valid escape is illegal in AREs. In EREs, there are no escapes: outside a bracket expression, a \ followed by an alphanumeric character merely stands for that character as an ordinary character, and inside a bracket expression, \ is an ordinary character. (The latter is the one actual incompatibility between EREs and AREs.)
trans-unit.target: 转义符（仅适用于ARE），以\开头，后跟字母数字字符，有多种形式：字符输入，类速记，约束转义和反向引用。在ARE中，一个\后跟一个字母数字字符但不构成有效的转义符是非法的。在ERE中，没有转义符：在括号表达式之外，带\的字母数字字符仅代表该字符作为普通字符，而在括号表达式内部，\是普通字符。（后者是ERE和ARE之间的一种实际不兼容。）

trans-unit.source: Event-driven I/O works best for channels that have been placed into non-blocking mode with the chan configure command. In blocking mode, a chan puts command may block if you give it more data than the underlying file or device can accept, and a chan gets or chan read command will block if you attempt to read more data than is ready; no events will be processed while the commands block. In non-blocking mode chan puts, chan read, and chan gets never block.
trans-unit.target: 事件驱动的I / O最适合使用chan configure命令置于非阻塞模式的通道。在阻止模式下，如果您给它提供的数据多于基础文件或设备可以接受的数量，chan puts命令可能会阻止，而如果您尝试读取的数据多于就绪数据，那么chan gets或chan read命令将阻止。命令阻塞时，不会处理任何事件。在非阻塞模式下，chan put，chan read和chan永远不会阻塞。

trans-unit.source: Event-driven I/O works best for channels that have been placed into nonblocking mode with the fconfigure command. In blocking mode, a puts command may block if you give it more data than the underlying file or device can accept, and a gets or read command will block if you attempt to read more data than is ready; a readable underlying file or device may not even guarantee that a blocking [read 1] will succeed (counter-examples being multi-byte encodings, compression or encryption transforms ). In all such cases, no events will be processed while the commands block.
trans-unit.target: 对于通过fconfigure命令置于非阻塞模式的通道，事件驱动的I / O效果最佳。在阻塞模式下，如果您给它提供的数据量超过了基础文件或设备可以接受的数量，则puts命令可能会阻塞；而如果您尝试读取的数据量超过了准备就绪的数据量，gets或read命令将阻塞。可读的底层文件或设备甚至无法保证阻止[read 1]成功（反例是多字节编码，压缩或加密转换）。在所有这些情况下，命令阻塞时都不会处理任何事件。

trans-unit.source: Every channel created with this subcommand knows which interpreter it was created in, and only ever executes its handler command in that interpreter, even if the channel was shared with and/or was moved into a different interpreter. Each reflected channel also knows the thread it was created in, and executes its handler command only in that thread, even if the channel was moved into a different thread. To this end all invocations of the handler are forwarded to the original thread by posting special events to it. This means that the original thread (i.e. the thread that executed the chan create command) must have an active event loop, i.e. it must be able to process such events. Otherwise the thread sending them will
trans-unit.target: 使用此子命令创建的每个通道都知道在哪个解释器中创建该通道，并且即使该通道与该共享器共享和/或已移至其他解释器中，也只能在该解释器中执行其处理程序命令。每个反射通道也知道创建该线程的线程，并且即使该通道移入了另一个线程，它也仅在该线程中执行其处理程序命令。为此，通过向处理程序发布特殊事件，将处理程序的所有调用转发到原始线程。这意味着原始线程（即执行chan create命令的线程）必须具有活动的事件循环，即它必须能够处理此类事件。否则，发送它们的线程将

trans-unit.source: Every interpreter has two kinds of resource limits that may be imposed by any master interpreter upon its slaves. Command limits (of type command) restrict the total number of Tcl commands that may be executed by an interpreter (as can be inspected via the info cmdcount command), and time limits (of type time) place a limit by which execution within the interpreter must complete. Note that time limits are expressed as
trans-unit.target: 每个解释器都有两种资源限制，任何主解释器都可能对其从属服务器施加资源限制。命令限制（类型命令）限制了解释器可以执行的Tcl命令总数（可以通过info cmdcount命令检查），时间限制（时间类型）对解释器中的执行设置了限制必须完成。请注意，时间限制表示为

trans-unit.source: Every limit has a number of options associated with it, some of which are common across all kinds of limits, and others of which are particular to the kind of limit.

trans-unit.source: Every locally-defined option may define a -cgetmethod; it is called when the option's value is retrieved using the cget method. Whatever the method's body returns will be the return value of the call to cget.
trans-unit.target: 每个本地定义的选项都可以定义一个-cgetmethod;当使用cget方法检索选项的值时,就会调用这个方法。无论方法的主体返回的是什么,都将是调用cget方法的返回值。

trans-unit.source: Every locally-defined option may define a -configuremethod; it is called when the option's value is set using the configure or configurelist methods. It is the named method's responsibility to save the option's value; in other words, the value will not be saved to the itcl_options() array unless the method saves it there.
trans-unit.target: 每个本地定义的选项都可以定义一个 -configuremethod;当使用 configure 或 configurelist 方法设置选项的值时,它会被调用。保存选项的值是被命名的方法的责任;换句话说,除非该方法将其保存到itcl_options()数组中,否则该值不会被保存。

trans-unit.source: Every locally-defined option may define a -validatemethod; it is called when the option's value is set using the configure or configurelist methods, just before the -configuremethod (if any). It is the named method's responsibility to validate the option's new value, and to throw an error if the value is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 每个本地定义的选项都可以定义一个-validatemethod;当使用configure或configurelist方法设置选项的值时,它会在-configuremethod(如果有的话)之前被调用。被命名的方法有责任验证选项的新值,并在值无效时抛出一个错误。

trans-unit.source: File names are grouped into three general types based on the starting point for the path used to specify the file: absolute, relative, and volume-relative. Absolute names are completely qualified, giving a path to the file relative to a particular volume and the root directory on that volume. Relative names are unqualified, giving a path to the file relative to the current working directory. Volume-relative names are partially qualified, either giving the path relative to the root directory on the current volume, or relative to the current directory of the specified volume. The file pathtype command can be used to determine the type of a given path.
trans-unit.target: 根据用于指定文件的路径的起点，文件名分为三种常规类型：绝对，相对和相对体积。绝对名称是完全限定的，提供相对于特定卷的文件路径以及该卷上的根目录。相对名称是无限制的，从而提供相对于当前工作目录的文件路径。卷相对名称是部分限定的，给出相对于当前卷上的根目录或相对于指定卷的当前目录的路径。该文件pathtype命令可用于确定给定的路径的类型。

trans-unit.source: Finally any single peer need not contain all lines from the underlying data store. When creating a peer, a contiguous range of lines (e.g. only lines 52 through 125) may be specified. This allows a peer to contain just a small portion of the overall text. The range of lines will expand and contract as text is inserted or deleted. The peer will only ever display complete lines of text (one cannot share just part of a line). If the peer's contents contracts to nothing (i.e. all complete lines in the peer widget have been deleted from another widget), then it is impossible for new lines to be inserted. The peer will simply become an empty shell on which the background can be configured, but which will never show any content (without manual reconfiguration of the start and end lines). Note that a peer which does not contain all of the underlying data store still has indices numbered from “1.0” to “end”. trans-unit.source: First, any absolute date and/or time is processed and converted. Using that time as the base, day-of-week specifications are added. Next, relative specifications are used. If a date or day is specified, and no absolute or relative time is given, midnight is used. Finally, a correction is applied so that the correct hour of the day is produced after allowing for daylight savings time differences and the correct date is given when going from the end of a long month to a short month.
trans-unit.target: 首先,对任何绝对日期和/或时间进行处理和转换。以该时间为基数,添加星期几的规格。其次,使用相对规格。如果指定了日期或日子,但没有给出绝对或相对时间,则使用午夜。最后,进行修正,以便在考虑到夏令时差异后产生正确的小时,并在从长月末到短月末时给出正确的日期。

trans-unit.source: For reading the resource, thread should obtain a read lock on the resource . Read lock is non-exclusive, meaning that more than one thread can obtain a read lock to the same resource, without waiting on other readers . For changing the resource, however, a thread must obtain a exclusive write lock . This lock effectively blocks all threads from gaining the read-lock while the resource is been modified by the writer thread . Only after the write lock has been released, the resource may be read-locked again .
trans-unit.target: 读取资源时,线程要获得资源的读锁。读锁是非排他性的,也就是说,多个线程可以获得同一个资源的读锁,而不需要等待其他读锁。但对于改变资源,线程必须获得一个独占的写锁。这个锁有效地阻止了所有线程在资源被写线程修改时获得读锁。只有在写锁被释放后,资源才可能再次被读锁。

trans-unit.source: For white-box (regression) tests, the target should be the name of the C function or Tcl procedure being tested. For black-box tests, the target should be the name of the feature being tested. Some conventions call for the names of black-box tests to have the suffix _bb. Related tests should share a major number. As a test suite evolves, it is best to have the same test name continue to correspond to the same test, so that it remains meaningful to say things like “Test foo-1.3 passed in all releases up to 3.4, but began failing in release 3.5.”
trans-unit.target: 对于白盒（回归）测试，目标应该是要测试的C函数或Tcl过程的名称。对于黑盒测试，目标应该是要测试的功能的名称。一些约定要求黑盒测试的名称具有后缀_bb。相关测试应共享一个主要数字。随着测试套件的发展，最好使相同的测试名称继续对应于相同的测试，这样说诸如“ Test foo-1.3在所有版本（直到3.4）中均已通过但在发行中开始失败）之类的含义仍然有意义。 3.5。”

trans-unit.source: For widgets that can lay themselves out with either a horizontal or vertical orientation, such as scrollbars, this option specifies which orientation should be used. Must be either horizontal or vertical or an abbreviation of one of these.
trans-unit.target: 对于可以以水平或垂直方向进行布局的小部件（例如滚动条），此选项指定应使用哪个方向。必须是水平或垂直的，或者是其中之一的缩写。

trans-unit.source: For widgets that can perform word-wrapping, this option specifies the maximum line length. Lines that would exceed this length are wrapped onto the next line, so that no line is longer than the specified length. The value may be specified in any of the standard forms for screen distances. If this value is less than or equal to 0 then no wrapping is done: lines will break only at newline characters in the text.
trans-unit.target: 对于可以进行文字包装的小组件,此选项指定了最大行长。超过此长度的行会被包覆到下一行,因此没有行长于指定长度。这个值可以用任何标准的屏幕距离表格来指定。如果该值小于或等于0,则不进行包装:只有在文本中的换行字符处才会断行。

trans-unit.source: For widgets with a slider that can be dragged to adjust a value, such as scrollbars, this option determines when notifications are made about changes in the value. The option's value must be a boolean of the form accepted by Tcl_GetBoolean. If the value is false, updates are made continuously as the slider is dragged. If the value is true, updates are delayed until the mouse button is released to end the drag; at that point a single notification is made (the value “jumps” rather than changing smoothly).
trans-unit.target: 对于具有可拖动以调整值的滑块的小部件（例如滚动条），此选项确定何时发出有关值更改的通知。该选项的值必须是Tcl_GetBoolean接受的形式的布尔值。如果值为false，则拖动滑块时将连续进行更新。如果该值为true，则更新将延迟到释放鼠标按钮以结束拖动为止；否则，此操作将延迟。届时，系统会发出一个通知（值“跳转”而不是平滑变化）。

trans-unit.source: Generate a Postscript representation for part or all of the canvas. If the -file option is specified then the Postscript is written to a file and an empty string is returned; otherwise the Postscript is returned as the result of the command. If the interpreter that owns the canvas is marked as safe, the operation will fail because safe interpreters are not allowed to write files. If the -channel option is specified, the argument denotes the name of a channel already opened for writing. The Postscript is written to that channel, and the channel is left open for further writing at the end of the operation. The Postscript is created in Encapsulated Postscript form using version 3.0 of the Document Structuring Conventions. Note: by default Postscript is only generated for information that appears in the canvas's window on the screen. If the canvas is freshly created it may still have its initial size of 1x1 pixel so nothing will appear in the Postscript. To get around this problem either invoke the update command to wait for the canvas window to reach its final size, or else use the -width and -height options to specify the area of the canvas to print. The
trans-unit.target: 为部分或全部画布生成Postscript表示。如果指定了-file选项，则将Postscript写入文件并返回空字符串；否则，Postscript作为命令的结果返回。如果拥有画布的解释器被标记为安全，则操作将失败，因为不允许安全解释器写入文件。如果-channel如果指定了option，则参数表示已经打开以进行写入的通道的名称。将Postscript写入该通道，并在操作结束时将该通道保持打开状态以便进一步写入。该Postscript使用文档结构约定3.0版以“封装Postscript”形式创建。注意：默认情况下，Postscript仅针对出现在屏幕上画布窗口中的信息生成。如果画布是新创建的，则画布的初始尺寸可能仍为1x1像素，因此后记中将不会出现任何内容。要解决此问题，请调用update命令以等待画布窗口达到其最终大小，或者使用-width和-height用于指定要打印的画布区域的选项。的

trans-unit.source: Grabs apply to particular displays. If an application has windows on multiple displays then it can establish a separate grab on each display. The grab on a particular display affects only the windows on that display. It is possible for different applications on a single display to have simultaneous local grabs, but only one application can have a global grab on a given display at once.

trans-unit.source: Gridded geometry management
trans-unit.target: 网格化几何管理

trans-unit.source: Gridded geometry management occurs when one of the widgets of an application supports a range of useful sizes. This occurs, for example, in a text editor where the scrollbars, menus, and other adornments are fixed in size but the edit widget can support any number of lines of text or characters per line. In this case, it is usually desirable to let the user specify the number of lines or characters-per-line, either with the wm geometry command or by interactively resizing the window. In the case of text, and in other interesting cases also, only discrete sizes of the window make sense, such as integral numbers of lines and characters-per-line; arbitrary pixel sizes are not useful.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序的小部件之一支持一定范围的有用尺寸时，便会发生网格几何管理。例如，这发生在文本编辑器中，其中滚动条，菜单和其他装饰的大小固定，但是编辑小部件可以支持每行任意数量的文本或字符。在这种情况下，通常希望让用户通过wm geometry命令或交互式调整窗口大小来指定行数或每行字符数。在文本的情况下，在其他有趣的情况下，只有离散大小的窗口才有意义，例如整数行和每行字符；任意像素大小都没有用。

trans-unit.source: Gridded geometry management provides support for this kind of application. Tk (and the window manager) assume that there is a grid of some sort within the application and that the application should be resized in terms of
trans-unit.target: 网格化几何管理为这种应用提供了支持。Tk(和窗口管理器)假设在应用程序中存在某种网格,并且应用程序的大小应该按以下方式调整。

trans-unit.source: Having completed and summarized all selected test files, runAllTests then recursively acts on subdirectories of configure -testdir. All subdirectories that match any of the patterns in configure -relateddir and do not match any of the patterns in configure -asidefromdir are examined. If a file named all.tcl is found in such a directory, it will be sourced in the caller's context. Whether or not an examined directory contains an all.tcl file, its subdirectories are also scanned against the configure -relateddir and configure -asidefromdir patterns. In this way, many directories in a directory tree can have all their test files evaluated by a single runAllTests command.
trans-unit.target: 完成并汇总所有选定的测试文件后，runAllTests然后递归作用于configure -testdir的子目录上。匹配任何模式的所有子目录中的配置-relateddir并且不匹配任何模式的配置-asidefromdir进行检查。如果在这样的目录中找到名为all.tcl的文件，它将在调用者的上下文中作为源 d。无论受检目录包含all.tcl文件，其子目录也会被扫描对配置-relateddir和配置-asidefromdir模式。这样，目录树中的许多目录都可以通过单个runAllTests命令评估其所有测试文件。

trans-unit.source: Hidden commands

trans-unit.source: Hidden commands in a slave interpreter can be invoked in the body of procedures called in the master during alias invocation. For example, an alias for source could be created in a slave interpreter. When it is invoked in the slave interpreter, a procedure is called in the master interpreter to check that the operation is allowable (e.g. it asks to source a file that the slave interpreter is allowed to access). The procedure then it invokes the hidden source command in the slave interpreter to actually source in the contents of the file. Note that two commands named source exist in the slave interpreter: the alias, and the hidden command.
trans-unit.target: 在别名调用期间，可以在主服务器中调用的过程主体中调用从属解释器中的隐藏命令。例如，可以在从属解释器中创建源的别名。在从属解释器中调用它时，将在主解释器中调用一个过程以检查该操作是否允许（例如，它要求提供允许从属解释器访问的文件）。然后，该过程将调用从属解释器中的hidden source命令，以实际获取文件内容的源。请注意，在从属解释器中存在两个名为source的命令：别名和隐藏命令。

trans-unit.source: If -global is specified preceding the filename, all symbols found in the shared library are exported for global use by other libraries. The option -lazy delays the actual loading of symbols until their first actual use. The options may be abbreviated. trans-unit.source: If tcl_precision is not zero, then when Tcl converts a floating point number, it creates a decimal representation of at most tcl_precision significant digits; the result may be shorter if the shorter result represents the original number exactly. If no result of at most tcl_precision digits is an exact representation of the original number, the one that is closest to the original number is chosen. If the original number lies precisely between two equally accurate decimal representations, then the one with an even value for the least significant digit is chosen; for instance, if tcl_precision is 3, then 0.3125 will convert to 0.312, not 0.313, while 0.6875 will convert to 0.688, not 0.687. Any string of trailing zeroes that remains is trimmed.
trans-unit.target: 如果tcl_precision不为零，则在Tcl转换浮点数时，它将创建最多tcl_precision有效数字的十进制表示形式；如果较短的结果恰好代表原始数字，则结果可能较短。如果最多tcl_precision个数字的结果中没有一个是原始数字的精确表示，则选择最接近原始数字的数字。如果原始数字恰好位于两个相等精度的十进制表示形式之间，则选择一个具有最低有效位数的偶数值的数字；例如，如果tcl_precision是3，则0.3125将转换为0.312，而不是0.313，而0.6875将转换为0.688，而不是0.687。修剪掉任何剩余的尾随零字符串。

trans-unit.source: If tclsh is invoked with arguments then the first few arguments specify the name of a script file, and, optionally, the encoding of the text data stored in that script file. Any additional arguments are made available to the script as variables (see below). Instead of reading commands from standard input tclsh will read Tcl commands from the named file; tclsh will exit when it reaches the end of the file. The end of the file may be marked either by the physical end of the medium, or by the character, “\032” (“\u001a”, control-Z). If this character is present in the file, the tclsh application will read text up to but not including the character. An application that requires this character in the file may safely encode it as “\032”, “\x1a”, or “\u001a”; or may generate it by use of commands such as format or binary. There is no automatic evaluation of .tclshrc when the name of a script file is presented on the tclsh command line, but the script file can always source it if desired.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用参数调用tclsh，则前几个参数指定脚本文件的名称，以及存储在该脚本文件中的文本数据的编码（可选）。所有其他参数都可以作为变量提供给脚本（请参见下文）。而不是从标准输入读取命令tclsh的将读取指定的文件Tcl命令; tclsh到达文件末尾时将退出。文件的结尾可以用介质的物理结尾或字符“ \ 032”（“-u001a”，control-Z）标记。如果文件中存在此字符，则tclsh应用程序将读取最多不包括该字符的文本。在文件中需要此字符的应用程序可以安全地将其编码为“ \ 032”，“ \ x1a”或“ \ u001a”；或者可以使用诸如format或binary的命令生成它。当在tclsh命令行上显示脚本文件的名称时，不会自动评估.tclshrc，但是如果需要，脚本文件可以始终作为源文件。

trans-unit.source: If unload determines that a library is not unloadable (or unload functionality has been disabled during compilation), an error will be returned. When both reference counts have reached 0, the library will be detached from the process.

trans-unit.source: If a file contains pure binary data (for instance, a JPEG image), the encoding for the channel should be configured to be binary. Tcl will then assign no interpretation to the data in the file and simply read or write raw bytes. The Tcl binary command can be used to manipulate this byte-oriented data. It is usually better to set the -translation option to binary when you want to transfer binary data, as this turns off the other automatic interpretations of the bytes in the stream as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件包含纯二进制数据（例如JPEG图像），则通道的编码应配置为binary。然后，Tcl将不对文件中的数据分配任何解释，而仅读取或写入原始字节。 Tcl 二进制命令可用于处理此面向字节的数据。当您要传输二进制数据时，通常最好将-translation选项设置为二进制，因为这也会关闭流中字节的其他自动解释。

trans-unit.source: If a format string lacks a %z or %Z format group, it is possible for the time to be ambiguous because it appears twice in the same day, once without and once with Daylight Saving Time. If this situation occurs, the first occurrence of the time is chosen. (For this reason, it is wise to have the input string contain the time zone when converting local times. This caveat does not apply to UTC times.)
trans-unit.target: 如果格式字符串缺少％z或％Z格式组，则该时间可能是模棱两可的，因为它在同一天出现两次，一次不带夏令时，一次出现。如果发生这种情况，则选择时间的第一次出现。（因此，在转换本地时间时，使输入字符串包含时区是明智的。此警告不适用于UTC时间。）

trans-unit.source: If a word starts with the string “{*}” followed by a non-whitespace character, then the leading “{*}” is removed and the rest of the word is parsed and substituted as any other word. After substitution, the word is parsed as a list (without command or variable substitutions; backslash substitutions are performed as is normal for a list and individual internal words may be surrounded by either braces or double-quote characters), and its words are added to the command being substituted. For instance, “cmd a {*}{b [c]} d {*}{$e f {g h}}” is equivalent to “cmd a b {[c]} d {$e} f {g h}”.
trans-unit.target: 如果单词以字符串“ {*}”开头，后跟非空格字符，则会删除开头的“ {*}”，并将其余单词解析并替换为其他单词。替换后，将该单词解析为一个列表（不使用命令或变量替换；对列表的正常执行反斜杠替换，并且各个内部单词可以用大括号或双引号字符包围），并将其单词添加到命令被替换。例如，“ cmd a {*} {b [c]} d {*} {$ ef {gh}}”等同于“ cmd ab {[c]} d {$ e} f {gh}”。

trans-unit.source: If an error is encountered while destructing an object, the delete command is aborted and the object remains alive. To destroy an object without regard for errors, use the "rename" command to destroy the object access command.
trans-unit.target: 如果销毁对象时遇到错误，则删除命令将中止，并且该对象将保持活动状态。要销毁对象而不考虑错误，请使用“ 重命名 ”命令销毁对象访问命令。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs during substitution, then subst will return that error. If a break exception occurs during command or variable substitution, the result of the whole substitution will be the string (as substituted) up to the start of the substitution that raised the exception. If a continue exception occurs during the evaluation of a command or variable substitution, an empty string will be substituted for that entire command or variable substitution (as long as it is well-formed Tcl.) If a return exception occurs, or any other return code is returned during command or variable substitution, then the returned value is substituted for that substitution. See the EXAMPLES below. In this way, all exceptional return codes are “caught” by subst. The subst command itself will either return an error, or will complete successfully.
trans-unit.target: 如果替换期间发生错误，那么subst将返回该错误。如果在命令或变量替换期间发生中断异常，则整个替换的结果将是字符串（替换后），直到引发异常的替换开始为止。如果在评估命令或变量替换期间发生继续异常，则将用空字符串代替整个命令或变量替换（只要其格式正确，即Tcl。）如果发生返回异常或任何其他返回在命令或变量替换期间返回代码，然后将返回值替换为该替换。请参阅下面的示例。这样，所有特殊的返回码都会被subst捕获。的subst命令本身将返回错误或成功完成。

trans-unit.source: If any column name is not unique among the columns in a result set, the results of -as dicts returns will be missing all but the rightmost of the duplicated columns. This limitation can be worked around by adding appropriate AS clauses to SELECT statements to ensure that all returned column names are unique. Plans are to fix this bug by using a C implementation of the driver, which will also improve performance significantly.

trans-unit.source: If button 1 is pressed with the Control key down, then if the mouse is over arrow1 or trough1 the view changes to the very top (left) of the document; if the mouse is over arrow2 or trough2 the view changes to the very bottom (right) of the document; if the mouse is anywhere else then the button press has no effect.

trans-unit.source: If button 2 is pressed over the trough or the slider, it sets the view to correspond to the mouse position; dragging the mouse with button 2 down causes the view to drag with the mouse. If button 2 is pressed over one of the arrows, it causes the same behavior as pressing button 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在槽或滑块上按下按钮2,则会将视图设置为与鼠标位置相对应;用按钮2向下拖动鼠标会使视图随鼠标拖动。如果在其中一个箭头上按下按钮2,则会导致与按下按钮1相同的行为。

trans-unit.target: 如果按下按钮2,则刻度尺的值被设置为鼠标位置。如果在按钮2向下拖动鼠标,则刻度尺的值会随着拖动而改变。

trans-unit.source: If case-independent matching is specified, the effect is much as if all case distinctions had vanished from the alphabet. When an alphabetic that exists in multiple cases appears as an ordinary character outside a bracket expression, it is effectively transformed into a bracket expression containing both cases, so that x becomes “[xX]”. When it appears inside a bracket expression, all case counterparts of it are added to the bracket expression, so that “[x]” becomes “[xX]” and “[^x]” becomes “[^xX]”.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了不区分大小写的匹配，则效果就好像所有区分大小写都从字母表中消失了一样。当在多种情况下存在的字母作为普通字符出现在方括号表达式之外时，它将有效地转换为包含这两种情况的方括号表达式，从而x变为“ [xX] ”。当它出现在方括号表达式中时，所有与之对应的大小写都将添加到方括号表达式中，以使“ [x] ”变为“ [xX] ”，“ [^ x] ”变为“ [^ xX] ”。

trans-unit.source: If more than one modifier is present then they are applied in left-to-right order. For example, the index “end - 1 chars” refers to the next-to-last character in the text and “insert wordstart - 1 c” refers to the character just before the first one in the word containing the insertion cursor. Modifiers are applied one by one in this left to right order, and after each step the resulting index is constrained to be a valid index in the text widget. So, for example, the index “1.0 -1c +1c” refers to the index “2.0”.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在多个修饰符，则按从左到右的顺序应用它们。例如，索引“ end-1 chars ”是指文本中的倒数第二个字符，而“ insert wordstart-1 c ”是指包含插入光标的单词中刚好在第一个字符之前的字符。修饰符按从左到右的顺序逐一应用，并且在每个步骤之后，结果索引都被约束为文本小部件中的有效索引。因此，例如，索引“ 1.0 -1c + 1c ”是指索引“ 2.0 ”。

trans-unit.source: If no -in, -after or -before option is specified then each of the slaves will be inserted at the end of the packing list for its parent unless it is already managed by the packer (in which case it will be left where it is). If one of these options is specified then all the slaves will be inserted at the specified point. If any of the slaves are already managed by the geometry manager then any unspecified options for them retain their previous values rather than receiving default values.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定-in，-after或-before选项，则每个从站都将在其父目录的装箱清单的末尾插入，除非已经由包装机管理（在这种情况下，它将被留在原地） ）。如果指定了这些选项之一，则所有从站将插入指定的位置。如果任何一个从属已由几何管理器管理，则任何未指定的从属选项都将保留其先前值，而不是接收默认值。

trans-unit.source: If no -tabs option is specified, or if it is specified as an empty list, then Tk uses default tabs spaced every eight (average size) characters. To achieve a different standard spacing, for example every 4 characters, simply configure the widget with “-tabs "[expr {4 * [font measure $font 0]}] left" -tabstyle wordprocessor”.

trans-unit.source: If standard input is not redirected with “<”, “<<” or “<@” then the standard input for the first command in the pipeline is taken from the application's current standard input.

trans-unit.source: If standard output has not been redirected then the exec command returns the standard output from the last command in the pipeline, unless “2>@1” was specified, in which case standard error is included as well. If any of the commands in the pipeline exit abnormally or are killed or suspended, then exec will return an error and the error message will include the pipeline's output followed by error messages describing the abnormal terminations; the -errorcode return option will contain additional information about the last abnormal termination encountered. If any of the commands writes to its standard error file and that standard error is not redirected and -ignorestderr is not specified, then exec will return an error; the error message will include the pipeline's standard output, followed by messages about abnormal terminations (if any), followed by the standard error output.
trans-unit.target: 如果标准输出尚未重定向，则exec命令从管道中的最后一条命令返回标准输出，除非指定了“ 2> @ 1”，在这种情况下，还包括标准错误。如果管道中的任何命令异常退出或被杀死或挂起，则exec将返回错误，并且错误消息将包括管道的输出，后跟描述异常终止的错误消息；该-errorcode返回选项将包含有关遇到的最后一个异常终止的其他信息。如果有任何命令写入其标准错误文件，并且该标准错误未重定向且未指定-ignorestderr，则执行将返回错误；错误消息将包括管道的标准输出，然后是有关异常终止的消息（如果有），然后是标准错误输出。

trans-unit.source: If the -command option is specified, then the HTTP operation is done in the background. ::http::geturl returns immediately after generating the HTTP request and the callback is invoked when the transaction completes. For this to work, the Tcl event loop must be active. In Tk applications this is always true. For pure-Tcl applications, the caller can use ::http::wait after calling ::http::geturl to start the event loop.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了-command选项，则HTTP操作在后台完成。:: http :: geturl在生成HTTP请求后立即返回，并在事务完成时调用回调。为此，Tcl事件循环必须处于活动状态。在Tk应用程序中，这始终是正确的。对于纯Tcl应用程序，调用者可以在调用:: http :: geturl之后使用:: http :: wait启动事件循环。

trans-unit.source: If the -default flag is given, the icon is applied to all toplevel windows (existing and future) to which no other specific icon has yet been applied. In addition to bitmap image types, a full path specification to any file which contains a valid Windows icon is also accepted (usually .ico or .icr files), or any file for which the shell has assigned an icon. Tcl will first test if the file contains an icon, then if it has an assigned icon, and finally, if that fails, test for a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了-default标志，则该图标将应用于尚未应用其他特定图标的所有顶级窗口（现有窗口和将来的窗口）。除位图图像类型外，还接受包含有效Windows图标的任何文件（通常是.ico或.icr文件）或外壳程序为其分配了图标的任何文件的完整路径规范。Tcl将首先测试文件是否包含图标，然后测试文件是否具有分配的图标，最后，如果失败，则测试位图。

trans-unit.source: If the idletasks keyword is specified as an argument to the command, then no new events or errors are processed; only idle callbacks are invoked. This causes operations that are normally deferred, such as display updates and window layout calculations, to be performed immediately.

trans-unit.source: If the HTTP transaction completes entirely, then status will be ok. However, you should still check the ::http::code value to get the HTTP status. trans-unit.source: If the Posix time zone string contains a DST (Daylight Savings Time) part, but doesn't contain a rule stating when DST starts or ends, then default rules are used. For Timezones with an offset between 0 and +12, the current European/Russian rules are used, otherwise the current US rules are used. In Europe (offset +0 to +2) the switch to summertime is done each last Sunday in March at 1:00 GMT, and the switch back is each last Sunday in October at 2:00 GMT. In Russia (offset +3 to +12), the switch dates are the same, only the switch to summertime is at 2:00 local time, and the switch back is at 3:00 local time in all time zones. The US switch to summertime takes place each second Sunday in March at 2:00 local time, and the switch back is each first Sunday in November at 3:00 local time. These default rules mean that in all European, Russian and US (or compatible) time zones, DST calculations will be correct for dates in 2007 and later, unless in the future the rules change again.
trans-unit.target: 如果Posix时区字符串包含DST(夏令时)部分,但不包含DST开始或结束的规则,则使用默认规则。对于偏移量在0到+12之间的时区,使用当前的欧洲/俄罗斯规则,否则使用当前的美国规则。在欧洲(偏移量+0至+2),切换到夏季时间是在每年3月的最后一个周日格林尼治标准时间1:00进行,切换回夏季时间是在每年10月的最后一个周日格林尼治标准时间2:00进行。在俄罗斯(偏移量+3至+12),切换日期是一样的,只是切换到夏令时的时间是当地时间2:00,在所有时区,切换回来的时间是当地时间3:00。美国切换到夏令时的时间是当地时间3月的第二个周日2:00,切换回来的时间是当地时间11月的第一个周日3:00。这些默认规则意味着,在所有欧洲、俄罗斯和美国(或兼容)时区,2007年及以后的日期的DST计算将是正确的,除非将来规则再次改变。

trans-unit.source: If the Tcl interpreter encounters a command name for which there is not a defined command (in either the current namespace, or the global namespace), then Tcl checks for the existence of an unknown handler for the current namespace. By default, this handler is a command named ::unknown. If there is no such command, then the interpreter returns an error. If the unknown command exists (or a new handler has been registered for the current namespace), then it is invoked with arguments consisting of the fully-substituted name and arguments for the original non-existent command. The unknown command typically does things like searching through library directories for a command procedure with the name

trans-unit.source: If the access path argument is not given or is the empty list, the default behavior is to let the slave access the same packages as the master has access to (Or to be more precise: only packages written in Tcl (which by definition cannot be dangerous as they run in the slave interpreter) and C extensions that provides a _SafeInit entry point). For that purpose, the master's auto_path will be used to construct the slave access path. In order that the slave successfully loads the Tcl library files (which includes the auto-loading mechanism itself) the tcl_library will be added or moved to the first position if necessary, in the slave access path, so the slave tcl_library will be the same as the master's (its real path will still be invisible to the slave though). In order that auto-loading works the same for the slave and the master in this by default case, the first-level sub directories of each directory in the master auto_path will also be added (if not already included) to the slave access path. You can always specify a more restrictive path for which sub directories will never be searched by explicitly specifying your directory list with the -accessPath flag instead of relying on this default mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 如果未给出访问路径参数或为空列表，则默认行为是让从服务器访问与主服务器可以访问的软件包相同的软件包（或更确切地说：仅使用Tcl编写的软件包（根据定义危险，因为它们在从属解释器中运行）和提供_SafeInit入口点的C扩展）。为此，主机的auto_path将用于构造从机访问路径。为了使从服务器成功加载Tcl库文件（包括自动加载机制本身），如有必要，将在从服务器访问路径中将tcl_library添加或移动到第一个位置，因此从服务器tcl_library将与主服务器相同（尽管它的真实路径仍然对从服务器不可见）。为了在默认情况下自动加载对从属服务器和主服务器相同，在主服务器auto_path中每个目录的第一级子目录也将添加（如果尚未包含）到从属访问路径。通过使用-accessPath标志显式指定目录列表，而不是依靠此默认机制，始终可以为从不搜索子目录的路径指定更严格的路径。

trans-unit.source: If the channel is blocking and the channel is ceasing to be writable, the command does not return until all output is flushed. If the channel is non-blocking and there is unflushed output, the channel remains open and the command returns immediately; output will be flushed in the background and the channel will be closed when all the flushing is complete.
trans-unit.target: 如果通道是阻塞的,且通道不再可写,则该命令不会返回,直到所有输出被刷新。如果通道是非阻塞的,且有未刷新的输出,则通道保持开放,命令立即返回;输出将在后台刷新,当所有的刷新完成后,通道将被关闭。

trans-unit.source: If the channel is blocking, the command does not return until all output is flushed. trans-unit.source: If the channel is in blocking mode the command does not return until all the buffered output has been flushed to the channel. trans-unit.source: If the element's allocated parcel is larger than the image, the image will be placed in the parcel based on the -sticky option. If the image needs to stretch horizontally (i.e., -sticky ew) or vertically (-sticky ns), subregions of the image are replicated to fill the parcel based on the -border option. The -border divides the image into 9 regions: four fixed corners, top and left edges (which may be tiled horizontally), left and right edges (which may be tiled vertically), and the central area (which may be tiled in both directions).
trans-unit.target: 如果元素的已分配宗地大于图像，则将基于-sticky选项将图像放置在宗地中。如果图像需要水平拉伸（即-sticky ew）或垂直拉伸（-sticky ns），则将基于-border选项复制图像的子区域以填充地块。所述-border将图像划分为9个区域：四个固定角，左上边缘（其可以被水平地平铺），左边缘和右边缘（其可以被纵向平铺），和中央区域（其可以在两个方向上平铺）。

trans-unit.source: If the first character of a word is an open brace (“{”) and rule [5] does not apply, then the word is terminated by the matching close brace (“}”). Braces nest within the word: for each additional open brace there must be an additional close brace (however, if an open brace or close brace within the word is quoted with a backslash then it is not counted in locating the matching close brace). No substitutions are performed on the characters between the braces except for backslash-newline substitutions described below, nor do semi-colons, newlines, close brackets, or white space receive any special interpretation. The word will consist of exactly the characters between the outer braces, not including the braces themselves.
trans-unit.target: 如果单词的第一个字符是大括号（“ {”）并且规则[5]不适用，则单词将由匹配的大括号（“}”）终止。括号嵌套在单词中：每个附加的右括号都必须有一个附加的右括号（但是，如果单词中的右括号或右括号用反斜杠引起来，则不算在匹配的右括号中）。除了下面描述的反斜杠-换行符替换外，不对括号之间的字符执行任何替换，分号，换行符，右括号或空格也不接受任何特殊解释。该单词将完全由外括号之间的字符组成，不包括括号本身。

trans-unit.source: If the first character of a word is double-quote (“"”) then the word is terminated by the next double-quote character. If semi-colons, close brackets, or white space characters (including newlines) appear between the quotes then they are treated as ordinary characters and included in the word. Command substitution, variable substitution, and backslash substitution are performed on the characters between the quotes as described below. The double-quotes are not retained as part of the word.
trans-unit.target: 如果单词的第一个字符是双引号（“”“），则该单词以下一个双引号字符结尾。如果在引号之间出现分号，右括号或空格字符（包括换行符），则它们被视为普通字符并包含在单词中，如下所述，对引号之间的字符执行命令替换，变量替换和反斜杠替换，双引号不保留为单词的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If the master for a slave is not its parent then you must make sure that the slave is higher in the stacking order than the master. Otherwise the master will obscure the slave and it will appear as if the slave has not been managed correctly. The easiest way to make sure the slave is higher than the master is to create the master window first: the most recently created window will be highest in the stacking order.
trans-unit.target: 如果从站的主站不是它的父站,那么您必须确保从站在堆叠顺序中的位置高于主站。否则,主站会遮挡住从站,而且会显得从站没有得到正确管理。要确保从属窗口高于主窗口,最简单的方法是先创建主窗口:最近创建的窗口将在堆叠顺序中排名最高。

trans-unit.source: If the master for a slave is not its parent then you must make sure that the slave is higher in the stacking order than the master. Otherwise the master will obscure the slave and it will appear as if the slave has not been packed correctly. The easiest way to make sure the slave is higher than the master is to create the master window first: the most recently created window will be highest in the stacking order. Or, you can use the raise and lower commands to change the stacking order of either the master or the slave.
trans-unit.target: 如果从站的主站不是其父站，则必须确保从站的堆叠顺序高于主站。否则，主站将使从站变得晦涩难懂，并且好像从站未正确打包一样。确保从站高于主站的最简单方法是首先创建主窗口：最新创建的窗口在堆叠顺序中最高。或者，您可以使用raise和lower命令更改主机或从机的堆叠顺序。

trans-unit.source: If the matching sequences contain more than one event, then tests (c)-(e) are applied in order from the most recent event to the least recent event in the sequences. If these tests fail to determine a winner, then the most recently registered sequence is the winner.
trans-unit.target: 如果匹配序列包含一个以上的事件,则按序列中最近的事件到最近的事件的顺序进行(c)-(e)测试。如果这些测试未能确定获胜者,那么最近登记的序列就是获胜者。

trans-unit.source: If the menubutton's state is disabled then none of the above actions occur: the menubutton is completely non-responsive.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用了菜单按钮的状态，则以上操作均不会发生：菜单按钮完全无响应。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is dragged out of the entry on the left or right sides while button 1 is pressed, the entry will automatically scroll to make more text visible (if there is more text off-screen on the side where the mouse left the window).
trans-unit.target: 如果在按下按钮1的同时,将鼠标从条目的左侧或右侧拖出,则条目会自动滚动,使更多的文字可见(如果鼠标离开窗口的一侧有更多的离屏文字)。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is dragged out of the spinbox on the left or right sides while button 1 is pressed, the spinbox will automatically scroll to make more text visible (if there is more text off-screen on the side where the mouse left the window).
trans-unit.target: 如果在按下按钮1的同时,将鼠标从旋转框的左侧或右侧拖出,旋转框将自动滚动,使更多的文字可见(如果鼠标离开窗口的一侧有更多的离屏文字)。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is dragged out of the widget while button 1 is pressed, the entry will automatically scroll to make more text visible (if there is more text off-screen on the side where the mouse left the window).

trans-unit.source: If the mouse leaves the listbox window with button 1 down, the window scrolls away from the mouse, making information visible that used to be off-screen on the side of the mouse. The scrolling continues until the mouse re-enters the window, the button is released, or the end of the listbox is reached.
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标在按下按钮1的情况下离开列表框窗口,窗口就会从鼠标上滚动,使鼠标边上过去不在屏幕上的信息显现出来。滚动一直持续到鼠标重新进入窗口,按钮被释放,或者到达列表框的末端。

trans-unit.source: If the optional script argument contains the thread::wait command the thread will enter into the event loop . If such command is not found in the script the thread will run the script to the end and exit . In that case, the handle may be safely ignored since it refers to a thread which does not exists any more at the time when the command returns .
trans-unit.target: 如果可选脚本参数包含thread :: wait命令，则该线程将进入事件循环。如果在脚本中未找到该命令，则线程将脚本运行至最后并退出。在那种情况下，可以安全地忽略该句柄，因为该句柄引用的是在命令返回时不再存在的线程。

trans-unit.source: If the overall pattern is preceded by an asterisk, then the overall pattern applies anywhere it can throughout the whole widget hierarchy. Otherwise the first word of the pattern is matched against the name and class of the “.” toplevel, which are usually set by options to wish.
trans-unit.target: 如果整体模式前面带有星号，则整体模式将在整个窗口小部件层次结构中尽可能应用。否则，将模式的第一个单词与“”的名称和类进行匹配。“ 顶层”，通常由希望的选项设置。

trans-unit.source: If the radiobutton's state is disabled then none of the above actions occur: the radiobutton is completely non-responsive.
trans-unit.target: 如果单选按钮的状态被禁用，则以上操作均不会发生：单选按钮完全不响应。

trans-unit.source: If the requested height of the embedded window is less than the height of the line in which it is displayed, this option can be used to specify whether the window should be stretched vertically to fill its line. If the -pady option has been specified as well, then the requested padding will be retained even if the window is stretched.
trans-unit.target: 如果嵌入式窗口的请求高度小于显示该窗口的行的高度，则此选项可用于指定是否应垂直拉伸该窗口以填充其行。如果还指定了-pady选项，则即使窗口被拉伸，请求的填充也将保留。

trans-unit.source: If the resulting date is impossible because the month has too few days (for example, when adding 1 month to 31 January), the last day of the month is substituted. Thus, adding 1 month to 31 January will result in 28 February in a common year or 29 February in a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 如果由于月份的天数太少而无法得出日期(例如,将1个月加到1月31日),则用该月的最后一天代替。因此,将1个月加到1月31日的结果是,普通年的2月28日或闰年的2月29日。

trans-unit.source: If the same file is loaded by different
trans-unit.target: 如果同一文件被不同的文件加载

trans-unit.source: If the same file is loaded by different
trans-unit.target: 如果同一文件被不同的文件加载

trans-unit.source: If the same value is specified separately with two different options, such as -x and -relx, then the most recent option is used and the older one is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用两个不同的选项（例如-x和-relx）分别指定了相同的值，那么将使用最新的选项，而较旧的选项将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If the scale is disabled using the -state option then none of the above bindings have any effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用-state选项禁用了小数位，则以上绑定均无效。

trans-unit.source: If the selection is claimed away by another application or by another window within this application, then the sel tag will be removed from all characters in the text.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择被另一个应用程序或该应用程序内的另一个窗口所取消，则sel标签将从文本中的所有字符中删除。

trans-unit.source: If the selection mode is multiple or extended, any number of elements may be selected at once, including discontiguous ranges. In multiple mode, clicking button 1 on an element toggles its selection state without affecting any other elements. In extended mode, pressing button 1 on an element selects it, deselects everything else, and sets the anchor to the element under the mouse; dragging the mouse with button 1 down extends the selection to include all the elements between the anchor and the element under the mouse, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择模式是多模式或扩展模式，则可以一次选择任意数量的元素，包括不连续的范围。在多模式下，单击元素上的按钮1可以切换其选择状态，而不会影响任何其他元素。在扩展模式下，按元素上的按钮1可以选择它，取消选择其他所有元素，然后将锚点设置到鼠标下方的元素上。使用按钮1向下拖动鼠标可扩展选择范围，使其包括锚点和鼠标下的元素之间的所有元素（包括该元素）。

trans-unit.source: If the selection mode is single or browse, at most one element can be selected in the listbox at once. In both modes, clicking button 1 on an element selects it and deselects any other selected item. In browse mode it is also possible to drag the selection with button 1. On button 1, the listbox will also take focus if it has a normal state.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择模式为单一或浏览，则一次可以在列表框中选择最多一个元素。在两种模式下，单击元素上的按钮1均将其选中，然后取消选择任何其他选定项。在浏览模式下，也可以使用按钮1拖动选择。在按钮1上，如果列表框处于正常状态，它也将成为焦点。

trans-unit.source: If the server closes the socket without replying, then no error is raised, but the status of the transaction will be eof.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器在没有答复的情况下关闭了套接字，则不会引发任何错误，但是事务的状态将为eof。

trans-unit.source: If the spinbox is disabled using the -state option, then the spinbox's view can still be adjusted and text in the spinbox can still be selected, but no insertion cursor will be displayed and no text modifications will take place.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用-state选项禁用了旋转框，则仍可以调整旋转框的视图，并且仍可以选择旋转框中的文本，但是不会显示插入光标，也不会进行文本修改。

trans-unit.source: If the string contains a %J format group, representing the Julian Day Number, that group is used to determine the date.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串包含表示儒略日编号的％J格式组，则该组用于确定日期。

trans-unit.source: If the string contains a %s format group, representing seconds from the epoch, that group determines the time of day.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串包含％s格式组（代表从纪元开始的秒数），则该组将确定一天中的时间。

trans-unit.source: If the string contains a %s format group, representing seconds from the epoch, that group is used to determine the date.
trans-unit.target: 如果该字符串包含一个％s格式组，表示从纪元开始的秒数，则该组用于确定日期。

trans-unit.source: If the string contains a complete set of format groups specifying century, year, month, and day of month; century, year, and day of year; or ISO8601 fiscal year, week of year, and day of week; those groups are combined and used to determine the date. If more than one complete set is present, the one at the rightmost position in the string is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串包含一个完整的格式组,指定世纪、年、月和月日;世纪、年和年的一天;或ISO8601财政年、年的一周和周的一天;这些组被合并并用于确定日期。如果有一个以上的完整组,则使用字符串中最右边位置的那个组。

trans-unit.source: If the string contains either an hour on the 24-hour clock or an hour on the 12-hour clock plus an AM/PM indicator, that hour determines the hour of the day. If the string further contains a group specifying the minute of the hour, that group combines with the hour. If the string further contains a group specifying the second of the minute, that group combines with the hour and minute.
trans-unit.target: 如果该字符串包含24小时时钟上的一个小时或12小时时钟上的一个小时加上一个AM/PM指示器,则该小时决定了一天的时间。如果字符串还包含一个指定小时的分钟的组,该组与小时合并。如果字符串进一步包含一个指定分钟的秒的组,该组与小时和分钟相结合。

trans-unit.source: If the string contains neither a %s format group nor a group specifying the hour of the day, then midnight (00:00, the start of the given date) is used. The time zone is determined by either the -timezone or -gmt options, or by using the current time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串既不包含％s格式组，也不包含指定一天中的时间的组，则使用午夜（00:00，给定日期的开始）。时区由-timezone或-gmt选项或使用当前时区确定。

trans-unit.source: If the string contains none of the above sets, but has a day of the month or day of the week, the day of the month or day of the week are used to determine the date by interpreting the base time in the given time zone and returning the given day of the current week or month. (The week runs from Monday to Sunday, ISO8601-fashion.) If both day of month and day of week are present, the day of the month takes priority.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串不包含上述任何一组,但有月日或周日,月日或周日通过解释给定时区的基准时间来确定日期,并返回当前一周或一个月的给定日期。(一周从周一到周日,ISO8601-fashion.)如果月日和周日都存在,则月日优先。

trans-unit.source: If the string entirely lacks any specification for the year (or contains the year only on the locale's alternative calendar) and contains a set of format groups specifying month and day of month, day of year, or week of year and day of week, those groups are combined and used to determine the date. If more than one complete set is present, the one at the rightmost position in the string is used. The year is determined by interpreting the base time in the given time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串中完全没有任何年份的说明(或者只包含了当地的替代日历上的年份),并且包含了一组格式组,指定了月和月日、年的一天,或者年的一周和周的一天,那么这些组将被合并起来,用来确定日期。如果有一个以上的完整组,则使用字符串中最右边位置的组。通过解释给定时区的基准时间来确定年份。

trans-unit.source: If the string lacks a century but contains a set of format groups specifying year of century, month and day of month; year of century and day of year; or two-digit ISO8601 fiscal year, week of year, and day of week; those groups are combined and used to determine the date. If more than one complete set is present, the one at the rightmost position in the string is used. The year is presumed to lie in the range 1938 to 2037 inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串没有世纪,但包含一组格式组,指定世纪年、月和月日;世纪年和年日;或两位数的ISO8601财政年、年周和周日;则合并这些组并用于确定日期。如果有一个以上的完整组,则使用字符串中最右边位置的那一组。推测年份的范围为1938年至2037年(含)。

trans-unit.source: If the subcommand throws an error the command which caused its invocation (usually chan close) will appear to have thrown this error. Any exception beyond error (e.g., break, etc.) is treated as (and converted to) an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果子命令抛出错误，则导致其调用（通常是chan close）的命令似乎已抛出该错误。错误以外的任何异常（例如break等）都将被视为（并转换为）错误。

trans-unit.source: If the subcommand throws an error the command which caused its invocation (usually fconfigure or chan configure) will appear to have thrown this error. Any exception beyond error (e.g., break, etc.) is treated as and converted to an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果子命令引发错误，则引起其调用的命令（通常是fconfigure或chan configure）将似乎引发了此错误。除错误外的任何异常（例如break等）都将被视为并转换为错误。

trans-unit.source: If the subcommand throws an error the command which performed the (re)configuration or query (usually fconfigure or chan configure) will appear to have thrown this error. Any exception beyond error (e.g., break, etc.) is treated as and converted to an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果子命令抛出错误，则执行（重新）配置或查询（通常是fconfigure或chan configure）的命令似乎已抛出该错误。除错误外的任何异常（例如break等）都将被视为并转换为错误。

trans-unit.source: If the subcommand throws an error, the command which performed the (re)configuration or query (usually fconfigure or chan configure) will appear to have thrown this error. Any exception beyond
trans-unit.target: 如果子命令抛出错误，则执行（重新）配置或查询（通常为fconfigure或chan configure）的命令将似乎已抛出此错误。超出范围的任何例外

trans-unit.source: If the subcommand throws any other error the command which caused its invocation (usually puts) will appear to have thrown this error. Any exception beyond error (e.g., break, etc.) is treated as and converted to an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果子命令引发任何其他错误，则导致其调用的命令（通常为puts）将似乎引发了该错误。除错误外的任何异常（例如break等）都将被视为并转换为错误。

trans-unit.source: If the subcommand throws any other error, the command which caused its invocation (usually gets, or read) will appear to have thrown this error. Any exception beyond error, (e.g., break, etc.) is treated as and converted to an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果子命令引发任何其他错误，则导致其调用（通常为gets或read）的命令将引发此错误。除error之外的任何异常（例如break等）都被视为并转换为错误。

trans-unit.source: If the tag is the name of a class of widgets, such as Button, the binding applies to all widgets in that class;
trans-unit.target: 如果标记是小部件类的名称，例如Button，则绑定将应用于该类中的所有小部件；否则，绑定将应用于该类中的所有小部件。

trans-unit.source: If the tag is the name of a toplevel window the binding applies to the toplevel window and all its internal windows.
trans-unit.target: 如果标记是toplevel窗口的名称,则绑定适用于toplevel窗口及其所有内部窗口。

A complete list of the location names is too lengthy to be listed here. On most Tcl installations, the definitions of the locations are to be found in named files in the directory “
trans-unit.target: 如果时区以冒号开头，则它是标准名称列表之一，例如：America / New_York，它给出了各种语言环境的规则。位置名称的完整列表太长，无法在此处列出。在大多数Tcl安装中，位置的定义可在目录“

trans-unit.source: If the user selects a color, tk_chooseColor will return the name of the color in a form acceptable to Tk_GetColor. If the user cancels the operation, both commands will return the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户选择一种颜色，则tk_chooseColor将以Tk_GetColor可接受的形式返回该颜色的名称。如果用户取消操作，则两个命令都将返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the user selects a file, both tk_getOpenFile and tk_getSaveFile return the full pathname of this file. If the user cancels the operation, both commands return the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户选择一个文件，则tk_getOpenFile和tk_getSaveFile都返回该文件的完整路径名。如果用户取消操作，则两个命令都返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the user types Control-y, the <<Paste>> binding will be invoked, but if the user presses button 2 then one of either the <<Paste>> or the <<Scroll>> bindings will be invoked, but exactly which one gets invoked is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户键入Control-y，将调用<< Paste >>绑定，但是如果用户按下按钮2，则将调用<< Paste >>或<< Scroll >>绑定之一，但准确地哪个被调用是不确定的。

trans-unit.target: 如果用户希望只做一个特定类型的链接,(如果因为某些原因无法实现,则发出错误信号),那么可选的

trans-unit.source: If the widget is disabled using the -state option, then its view can still be adjusted and text can still be selected, but no insertion cursor will be displayed and no text modifications will take place.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用-state选项禁用了窗口小部件，那么仍可以调整其视图并仍可以选择文本，但是不会显示插入光标，也不会进行文本修改。

trans-unit.source: If the window is not as tall as the line in which it is displayed, this option determines where the window is displayed in the line.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗口的高度没有显示的行高,这个选项决定了窗口在行中的显示位置。

trans-unit.source: If there are any arguments following
trans-unit.target: 如果后面有任何参数

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple lines of text, specifies how the lines are laid out relative to one another. One of left, center, or right. See also -anchor.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多行文本，请指定各行之间的布局方式。其中的左，中心，或右。另请参见-anchor。

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple traces on a variable they are invoked in order of creation, most-recent first. If one trace returns an error, then no further traces are invoked for the variable. If an array element has a trace set, and there is also a trace set on the array as a whole, the trace on the overall array is invoked before the one on the element.
trans-unit.target: 如果在一个变量上有多个跟踪,则按照创建的顺序,先调用最近的跟踪。如果一个跟踪返回一个错误,那么就不会再调用该变量的跟踪。如果一个数组元素有一个跟踪集,并且数组整体上也有一个跟踪集,那么整体数组上的跟踪将在元素上的跟踪之前被调用。

trans-unit.source: If there are no arguments, or the arguments do not specify a
trans-unit.target: 如果没有参数,或者参数没有指定一个

trans-unit.source: If there are two (or more) virtual events that are both triggered by the same sequence, and both of those virtual events are bound to the same window tag, then only one of the virtual events will be triggered, and it will be picked at random:
trans-unit.target: 如果有两个(或更多)虚拟事件都是由同一个序列触发的,而且这两个虚拟事件都绑定在同一个窗口标签上,那么只有其中一个虚拟事件会被触发,而且会被随机挑选。

trans-unit.source: If there is a pointer grab in effect, Enter and Leave events are only delivered to the window owning the grab.

trans-unit.source: If this callback is changed, it is called with the preferences valid for the package.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个回调被改变,它就会以对包有效的偏好被调用。

trans-unit.source: If this is an integer greater than or equal to zero, then it gives the index of the button that is to be the default button for the dialog (0 for the leftmost button, and so on). If less than zero or an empty string then there will not be any default button.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是一个大于或等于0的整数,那么它给出了将成为对话框默认按钮的索引(0代表最左边的按钮,以此类推)。如果小于零或者是一个空字符串,那么将不会有任何默认按钮。

trans-unit.source: If this option has a non-empty value, then it specifies a Tcl command to invoke whenever the menu is torn off. The actual command will consist of the value of this option, followed by a space, followed by the name of the menu window, followed by a space, followed by the name of the name of the torn off menu window. For example, if the option's value is “a b” and menu .x.y is torn off to create a new menu .x.tearoff1, then the command “a b .x.y .x.tearoff1” will be invoked. This option is ignored under Aqua/Mac OS X, where menus cannot be torn off.

trans-unit.source: If you are indexing two binary files and one depends on the other, you should specify the one that has dependencies last. This way the one without dependencies will get loaded and indexed, and then the package it provides will be available when the second file is processed. You may also need to load the first package into the temporary interpreter used to create the index by using the -load flag; it will not hurt to specify package patterns that are not yet loaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果要为两个二进制文件建立索引，并且一个依赖另一个文件，则应指定最后一个具有依赖性的文件。这样，一个没有依赖项的文件将被加载并建立索引，然后在处理第二个文件时，它提供的包将可用。您可能还需要使用-load标志将第一个程序包加载到用于创建索引的临时解释器中。指定尚未加载的包模式不会有任何伤害。

trans-unit.source: If you have a package that is split across scripts and a binary file, then you should avoid the -load flag. The problem is that if you load a package before computing the index it masks any other files that provide part of the same package. If you must use -load, then you must specify the scripts first; otherwise the package loaded from the binary file may mask the package defined by the scripts.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有一个跨脚本和二进制文件分割的软件包，则应避免使用-load标志。问题在于，如果在计算索引之前加载了程序包，它将屏蔽提供同一程序包一部分的任何其他文件。如果必须使用-load，那么必须首先指定脚本；否则，必须先指定脚本。否则，从二进制文件加载的软件包可能会掩盖脚本定义的软件包。

trans-unit.source: If you install the package anywhere else, then you must ensure that the directory containing the package is in the auto_path global variable or an immediate subdirectory of one of the directories in auto_path. Auto_path contains a list of directories that are searched by both the auto-loader and the package loader; by default it includes $tcl_pkgPath. The package loader also checks all of the subdirectories of the directories in auto_path. You can add a directory to auto_path explicitly in your application, or you can add the directory to your TCLLIBPATH environment variable: if this environment variable is present, Tcl initializes auto_path from it during application startup.
trans-unit.target: 如果将软件包安装在其他任何地方，则必须确保包含该软件包的目录位于auto_path全局变量中，或者位于auto_path中的目录之一的直接子目录中。Auto_path包含由自动加载器和程序包加载器搜索的目录列表。默认情况下，它包括$ tcl_pkgPath。包加载器还会检查auto_path中目录的所有子目录。您可以在应用程序中显式地将目录添加到auto_path，也可以将目录添加到TCLLIBPATH环境变量：如果存在此环境变量，则Tcl初始化auto_path 在应用程序启动过程中从中获取。
